title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From company TimeBandits, comes 2 great custom, hand-painted action figures:Satoshi Nakamoto "OG": https://www.timebanditswatches.com/collections/featured-products/products/satoshi-nakamoto-ogSatoshi Nakamoto "Masked": https://www.timebanditswatches.com/collections/featured-products/products/satoshi-nakamoto-masked-action-figureBoth are limited to 50 pieces each and come with a Counterparty NFT They also offer other cool limited action figures like Tesla, etc: https://www.timebanditswatches.com/¬† ¬†(good stuff )

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: This is just too cool to miss out on, thanks MJHas anyone purchased from this company previously, are they reputable?Any plans on a group buy MJ?If so i will take one

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on December 21, 2022, 12:04:05 PMThis is just too cool to miss out on, thanks MJHas anyone purchased from this company previously, are they reputable?Any plans on a group buy MJ?If so i will take oneI ordered last week on a Saturday, and they arrived to me by Monday...¬† was some USPS mail magic Had to email them about something, and got a quick response and everything was great. No group buy, but if you are outside US, can have them shipped to me for reshipping if wanted!!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: due to seriously running out of room atm I opted for the pins instead - my pin board has a lot of space still lol

comments.author: PeakDK
comments.body: I just bought a Satoshi Nakamoto "OG" Action Figure order üëäI'm looking forward to receive the figure üòç

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: Thanks MJ, I got a set. Will stick them with my bobblehead and other Satoshi things...we're getting quite the "collection", huh?

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Had to also add Tesla to my collection along Satoshi

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on December 24, 2022, 10:23:54 PM Had to also add Tesla to my collection along Satoshi They have a great selection of figures indeed.Also very much love to see George Carlin there, wish I could have seen him live. Ordered some Satoshis, too.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on December 24, 2022, 11:00:56 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on December 24, 2022, 10:23:54 PM Had to also add Tesla to my collection along Satoshi They have a great selection of figures indeed.Also very much love to see George Carlin there, wish I could have seen him live. Ordered some Satoshis, too. Indeed.. quite the ledgendHopefully US orders are being received.I got some in yesterday for myself and another collector
